column5: seems like a decent deal. i will pick one up to use for over the winter. http://www.canadiantire.ca/browse/product_...fromSearch=true  but sorry, the sale is ending this week, better get one fast if you want one..
Kevin,The CTC here was sold out pretty fast. They are of decent quality.I have had mine for the last 2 years and also use it for traveling aswell.
